attributes.action: Assign 888 as outlined in the requested documentation.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
You will likely have read the poll document. Please be sure to vote here by inserting your details below.


To those in the dark...

...This is an attempt to preserve a fantastic launch event for the youngsters of an assured new utility that is ethically sensitive. It promises to be a positive world-wide phenominon that will demonstrate the UK's commitment to help create one nation.

Background...

...All Ministers have refused to respond to a very large UK initiative for twelve months despite Police Commissioner recognition. Mandates are not known but the Teams Mission Statement and suggested strategy are clear and its ideals are clearly in the public interest. A sample poll shows that the current Government stance does not reflect the wishes of the masses.

This is a non-political event.

Mr Clegg has stated his position.
Mr Cameron has yet to comment.

Team 3 D.L.M. is a Committee.


Send an email to;

info@3dlm.co.uk

and we will likely send more detail by reply. Please note that press and commercial based enquiries are inappropriate at present hence we ask that your position is stated (i.e. your occupation)...

...money is not our motivator, thanks.

reasons: Commercial endorsement, promotion of any product, service or publication, or statements that amount to adverts
